#Meetings & #Events
Con sede en #Bilbao, la @EU_OSHA celebró ayer su 25 aniversario. Siempre es un placer celebrar este tipo de eventos en #Euskalduna. Os dejamos algunas fotografías 👇👇 https://t.co/i3Dni4UIqX

Happy Birthday to EUOSHA, the European Agency for #Safety and #Health at Work and congrats to the fantastic #EUOSHA team working at Bilbao HQ 🇪🇸 making #workplaces more safe 👍
#euosha25 #osh https://t.co/TJolqjJ8c1

.@EU_OSHA helps business, especially micro and small enterprises, turn high standards on health and safety into reality. 
#EUOSHA25 Celebrating the past and looking towards the future- workers’ safety and health in the age of robots, platforms and artificial intelligence. https://t.co/kEz6I3TnUo

Jesús Loza ha participado hoy en Bilbao en el acto de celebración del 25 aniversario de la Agencia Europea para la Seguridad y Salud en el Trabajo @EU_OSHA, la única agencia de la UE que tiene su sede en el País Vasco, y en el que ha intervenido la Secretaria de Estado de Empleo. https://t.co/DpdQZdKuP9

tweets.text: It is a great honor for us to host the 25th Anniversary celebrations of @EU_OSHA, Deusto University looks into the future with confidence & optimism based on the belief of a social Europe. Juan José Etxeberria, Vice-Rector of the University of Deusto #EUOSHA25 https://t.co/7pgWztUjxB
Congratulations to @EU_OSHA, @eurofound sister Agency. 25 years working for healthier and safer workplaces. Impressive setting to celebrate at @deusto University https://t.co/dA4x4RulwW

The #EUOSHA25 celebration ceremony is officially open!
